website_summaries.verdict: A versatile product – however you plan to use diatomaceous earth, this formula is more likely to meet your expectations than competitors.
pros: Mined from a food grade source and carefully packaged in food grade bags
This natural formula is pure, safe, and dependable for a variety of uses, and has a smooth consistency for those who consume it
cons: Doesn't work for everyone, and is a bit dusty and messy when applied dry

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality and digestibility of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and digestibility of this product, and love that it comes in a re-sealable bag. I like that the product is super smooth, and not gritty (to me) at all. It mixes super easily in with my flavored water and has virtually no taste. Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: tattooedsuess

customer_reviews.title: Works on Bad Flea Infestations!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my cats fleas.. they were very very bad.. It has been 3 weeks of putting it on them every day... The flees are almost gone.. The cat had scabs and most of them r healed..ive heard other reports that the fleas are killed pretty much instantly, so im left wondering if this diatomaceous earth is as potent as it should be.. Either way it was WAY CHEAPER than buying a $60 pack of Advantage II. i think the flee eggs keep hatching. then they die. so once the cycle is done im hoping that they will stay away..
customer_reviews.author: Xion'sWake

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it's weight in gold! I am a skeptic of skeptics and did hours of research before buying or using Root Naturally DE. After deciding I had nothing to lose I am now a believer! Started with a half teaspoon and worked up over two weeks to a full tablespoon. I've suffered for two years with undiagnosed digestive issues. Plagued by bloating, gas, abdominal pain, diarrhea, sulphur burps and weight loss. Well.... I pooped out three or more whole freaking worms the other day as well as more pieces. Pretty sure I found the problem and am feeling better daily. As for DE and it's effectiveness against parasites?? Well, not to be gross but the proof is in the pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. Last spring we had carpenter ants inside. I put this down and problem solved. So I put this around the perimiter of the house to keep ants away. It works. THIS WORKS ON BUGS. I'll be putting a layer of this stuff under all the cabinets and installs in home remodels from now on. Additionally if taken internally (with liquid) it will help clean out your gut. Some say it will detox, but I have no idea if that's true. I do know it will act like fiber- a scrubby fiber.
customer_reviews.author: EJTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Rid a room infested with fleas dragged in by my friend. Took a week, and no fleas left and nothing spread to other rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Helped rid a room of fleas that my friend dragged in to my house from his accursed cats. I didn't want chemicals and 'bombs' to get rid of the fleas. They aren't always the solution. I layered the carpet and even the walls with this stuff, took a broom to the carpet to really grind the stuff in. Within a week, no more fleas. I vacuumed up as much as I could, and wiped the walls down. I added another thin layer and ground that in with a broom just to make sure. Anything that is harmless to me and my dogs, yet death to pests, is always wonderful in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: We use this stuff as a non poisonous alternative to ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this stuff as a non poisonous alternative to bug killer in the house. Knocks ants, spiders, roaches any bug dead. They suffocate. Does a job on fire ants too without using nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: helps me sleep
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking DE in my water after reading about it online. When I drink it before bed, I sleep through the night and have vivid dreams. I would take it regularly, but the chalky texture is a deterrent. I have found that it's easier to take with luke warm water rather than cold.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money! Everyone should have this on hand!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for fleas, critters with exoskeletons, safe if your animals eat it; and even healthy to consume for heavy metal detox!
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: You will think I am crazy...
customer_reviews.text: I know this is food grade and I’m sure it has a lot of great uses, BUT I use this as pest control. 😂 I live in Italy and we have some outlandish bugs that we don’t hate in the states (stinky bugs, crazy centipedes, scorpions). We sprinkle this around the perimeter. It actually eats the exoskeleton of most of what crosses it and VOILA. I can’t brag enough about it!! Safe for the kiddo, cat and dog too!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous earth is one product I take daily and I love it. Also great for preventing insect infestations.
customer_reviews.text: I take diatomaceous earth daily for health issues and it is wonderful. With it I have no more acid reflux, my skin is not itchy during the winter time, and it helps hair and nails grow because it is 85% silica. I have been taking it for years and I never run out. It is also the best anti-parasite for humans and animals and can be sprinkled around doors, windows, and your house, inside and out, to kill insects as it is safe and non-toxic for pets and children.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use diatomaceous earth a lot. I poof it around my house to control fleas. I use it for my chickens to control mites. I have also rubbed it on my cats. This is great stuff. Just wear gloves when you use it. It will dry your hands, just like it is suppose to do. Be careful not to go wild poofing. It is not the best thing to breath. I don't use it in my garden because it kills worms. I leave the slugs to the chickens.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: It's great to sprinkle over my dogs outside food bowl to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for so many things! It's great to sprinkle over my dogs outside food bowl to keep ants away and also keeps the dogs dewormed. I also use it liberally in my daughters covered sand box where spiders like to hang out. Since I've been using it in there, no spiders. We also drink and take internally as a wonderful yeast cleanse and heavy metal detox.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMomma10

customer_reviews.title: Keeps fleas under control
customer_reviews.text: Obnoxious but it works. I think DE is a bit of a pain but with six dogs living in the deep South, this REALLY helped to control my flea issues. Believe me, I've tried EVERYTHING and this is the only thing that actually keeps the fleas under control. I don't like using poisons on my animals or yard (bless the earthworms and bees) so this product is a must. I took off one point because it's a bit of a pain. It's not the fault of DE.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best natural pest control!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely affective for pest control! I bought this without much expectation despite the positive reviews I read. I was pleasantly surprised at how well this actually works. Before moving into new house, I sprinkled this around doorways, windows, garage, etc. The house wasn't infested but found several dead roaches and dead ants the day after!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: ANT-B-GONE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this solely as a means of ant elimination in my home. I had tried store bought poison - I think they became immune, then professional pest control - results lasted a week, and finally, I bought DE. Sprinkling this on the active ant trail cleared the critters in minutes. I used about a teaspoon of the 5 pounds and my home has been ant free for over 3 months. And it was a heck of a lot cheaper than paying an ineffective pest control company. And since it's food grade DE, I had no concerns for our cat's safety. I'd buy it again, but I have enough for several lifetimes.
customer_reviews.author: ND Filmer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for personal use and in home
customer_reviews.text: This has been my second order, I thought the first 5 pounds would last much longer. I purchased it sometime in the winter. However, I use it for everything, keep ants away, put in my gardens, corners of the house to keep spiders away. I also ingest it for certain deficiencies. Hopefully, this 5 pounds last longer but I use it on everything so I doubt it will. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: josephine

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep horse hooves healthy through winter.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my horse's feet healthy through the winter. After cleaning his hoofs well, I apply with a 1" paint brush. I have used diatomaceous earth to deter ants around the perimeter of my house. I have not used this product internally, although some at my barn add to the horses' diets to reduce parasites. Maybe I'll experiment. This is a lot of product. It comes in a very large, flat, plastic bag. I bought a large bucket with a lid to store.
customer_reviews.author: Babbbs

customer_reviews.title: Worked like Miracle for Cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: I had problem with roaches from a long time. I got the apartment people to do do treatment multiple times but they were of no use. I never used to leave any food on counters and took all precautions to avoid cockroaches but nothing worked out. With one of friends suggestion, i bought 1 lb pack of this, spread out across all the cupboards in kitchen, and in the corners wherever i see roaches. Finally after one month I can say my house is roaches free. Whatever was not possible through different terminator treatments, happened like miracle with this.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked!  Ants are gone.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really believe in this, but did not want to poison me or my pets as I fought a new ant invasion. So, I gave it a try. After just 2 days there were hardly any ants. After 4 days, they were gone. I have only seen 2 in the several weeks since then, and I think they came in on the newspaper bag. I sprinkled it in their path and in my kitchen garbage can, and that was all it took. Thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Calliopia

customer_reviews.title: good but no zip lock to close it up
customer_reviews.text: Nicve big bag, great price. Only issue is that there is NO ZIP LOCK TO CLOSE IT UP ! I would have thought they would have that so I took off a star for that
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for Cock roaches
customer_reviews.text: Excellent works . Highly recommend. Customer service contacted with helpful hints and asking if I am satisfied with product. Really good company to deal with. Hope this lasts for a while. Bugs are disappearing by the hour. Yeah!! DM is the best.
customer_reviews.author: VSTROMM05

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a huge favor and try this
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have rheumatoid arthritis and fibromyalgia and started taking this 3 weeks ago. I don't hurt all over as much, I have more energy and I am sleeping better most nights, haven't done that in years! Noticed my nails are stronger and my hair is softer.also
customer_reviews.author: P. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. . . best bug killer anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Best ant and bug pesticide around! Safe and easy to use. Wonderful inside the house and outside, too, for plants. My walnut tree had some catepillars and bugs starting on it and I dusted it with this and they are gone now. This is such a reasonably priced product and it's so great for cabinets, pet-safe, anywhere you might have bugs. Never need the exterminator with this. I put it in my garden, too. It's a safe, natural product to use and washes away with the rain so you do have to put it back on but most of the time, I don't, because there's no more bugs.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Death by a thousand cuts if you're a flea.
customer_reviews.text: Non toxic food grade diatomacious earth means curtins for fleas but safe for pets and humans when used sensibly. Even though you can eat it you don't want to breathe in dust. You just don't. Use a filter mask and follow directions. The stuff is very fine and will throw up a dust cloud. It works because the individual diatoms are shaped like razor wire on a miniature level. Armor piercing death by dehydration to Fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Techfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for deodorizing and natural flea control. I love that it is a natural product that doesn't leave a chemical residue.
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a flea powder and deoderizer. Messy to use but it worked well to dry up flea eggs. It also worked well on some used chairs that i bought which had a smell of dog, not overpowering but I tried 3 bottles of febreeze and the odor was still in the chairs. I used this powder liberally all over the chairs and cushions and even on the backs of the chairs and let them sit for an entire day. Now we can sit in the chairs and not smell the previous owners dog.
customer_reviews.author: Gamom

customer_reviews.title: Maybe we had Super-Fleas...
customer_reviews.text: This DE did not seem to have any ill effect on the fleas that took up residence in our living room carpet. Wanted to try a natural solution, but ended up usingagain - with excellent results!
customer_reviews.author: The Reillys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I use it for so many things. I’ve been using it for a year now and just as impressed now as I was before. You can ingest it, use it as body scrub, lol....kill bugs. It’s just crazy how versatile this is. This is not a gimmick like I initially thought it may be. And there is a ton of it. I haven’t even used half of it yet. 2 thumbs up :)
customer_reviews.author: MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: 5 lbs is seriously a lot
customer_reviews.text: DE is awesome: I mix it in with soil in potted plants/vegetables and sprinkle it around doorways to keep the bugs out. I like that this brand is food grade, just in case the dog or cat get too curious. I got the 5 pound bag but could have gotten away with the 1 pound. You really just need a sprinkling of DE- I didn't realize how much 5 pounds would be, but I have enough left to last years.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Calendula

customer_reviews.title: Great product here. HUGE bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product here. HUGE bag. I put in a mason jar with 10 drops of thieves essential oil & a shaker lid. Sprinkled on the carpets and let it sit for 2 hours. Deodorized great & found a millipede while cleaning our rental and sprinkled some on it and it worked very fast. I had read this was safe for children to be around, so I sprinkled some in the corners and along the outside walls on the carpet to see if it keeps bugs out or kills any that might be hiding. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Leftfoot

customer_reviews.title: whats not to like.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for gardening, especially indoors. It goes into the first 1/2" of the soil in all my pots and eliminates those soil borne pests that drive you crazy as well as anything out there. No odor, no mess, and it's completely organic, whats not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Gardener

customer_reviews.title: after crossing over/through this Awesome product, Diatomaceous Earth
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida, sometimes the critters think they need to come indoors with the people; blessing us with his presence, the dreaded Palmetto Bug. I read online that any bug that has a skeleton, after crossing over/through this Awesome product, Diatomaceous Earth, the bug will dehydrate and die. Much to my surprise, it worked like a charm (approximately 5 days after sprinkling, poof, gone)! Instead of paying the bug man the $100 he was asking for to come spray the house, bought this "Natural" pet friendly product and put that $100 in my pocket! It was one of the best things I've purchased from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly bug killer
customer_reviews.text: I spread this is a solid line (using a plastic squeeze bottle) around the entire foundation of my house and dusted under the eaves. We had a huge spider and ant infestation problem prior to using this. Every bug was dead with a few days and stayed that way. I would re-dust after a hard rain and spot treat as needed. We also had drafty windows that would let bugs in. I would put this in the track of the window sliders and would find dead bug everywhere. This stuff is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Works to kill insects
customer_reviews.text: Living in Hawaii, fighting insects is a constant battle. I dust this into every crevice I can find, and it keeps most at bay. If I'm not vigilant, ants will find a home in an seldom used appliance (electronic equipment, coffee pot, etc.), but a quick dusting around it will get rid of them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: has a lot of uses daily supplement
customer_reviews.text: Natural Source of Silica. Food-grade diatomaceous earth is composed of approximately 85% silica. ... Promotes Skin Health. Because diatomaceous earth is a strong abrasive, it is often used as a toothpaste and facial exfoliator. ... Supports Heart Health. ... Natural Pesticide. ... Internal Cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous Earth lives up to its reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read it would get rid of roaches without any deadly chemicals. It works. It took a couple of weeks but after sprinkling the earth around in the kitchen, I have stopped seeing roaches. I know there are other uses for it and will probably try them.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Food grade not intended for insect control
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and it was as advertised but it ain't worth a darn as a pest deterrent. I suspect since this is a food grade product that it has been processed too finely to cause any exoskeletal damage to insects. It does seem to keep larger slugs away but the little ones just slide right over it. 4 stars because the bag is a pain the behind to reseal. Use DE for pools for a true insect deterrent
customer_reviews.author: Nonamemarine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for fleas.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help treat a flea infestation in our home after reading that it was a more cost effective option than OTC flea products. We rubbed it on all four of our cats and worked it into all of the soft surfaces. We did this for about two weeks before becoming more and more frustrated with the situation. All this stuff wound up doing was leaving dust everywhere and drying out our skin if we came in contact with it. Despite following all recommendations, we still have fleas so this didn't work for us. I don't know about the quality of diatomaceous earth so.I suppose this is of adequate quality, just didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been taking for 1 month changing my house for the better
customer_reviews.text: This is high-quality diatomaceous earth, you cannot beat the price. My hair is growing back, I'm more regular, have more energy I could go on and on buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this but it came very quickly and packaged well. I used it on my rabbit to treat fleas naturally because they are very sensitive to chemicals. It was a little dusty at first but once I got the hang of it, it's not bad. So far I haven't seen another flea since treating him! Hopefully it continues to work as I have 2 more rabbits and 2 rats to treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, it was reasonably prices, what more can I ask?
customer_reviews.text: This is a real value, you get a lot of DE for the money. It has ZERO taste, and it's chalky, but that's what I ordered. Put it in some juice, or with a protein drink, and gulp it down, no problemo.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this in their home.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works for insects. It is also good for removing heavy metals from the body.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Kills fleas
customer_reviews.text: My cat got out for a couple hours, and I think that's how we ended up with a flea infestation. Found out about diatomaceous earth with some research. After spreading the DE around, the fleas were dead after a couple weeks. I bought way too much though. I probably didn't use much more than half a cup for a 2-bedroom townhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban

customer_reviews.title: 5 lbs. Diatomaceous Earth
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in the garden around plants to keep pests in control. Works very well. I plan on doing some food storage and will use it for that also. It's a good buy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sitz

customer_reviews.title: This earth is good for you
customer_reviews.text: This product met my expectations and I have been taking it faithfully every morning. No more candida and I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Needham

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and is very clean and no horrible after taste. We use it in our dry goods to keep bugs out, and also use it once per year to keep our bodies pest free. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Zukgod

customer_reviews.title: Root Naturally Food Grade Diatomaceous Earth Great Product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product - we use almost every day for great health supplement.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bohnas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't kill ants
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well and on time. Did not work for my purpose of killing ants. Saw ants for weeks later covered in the white powder not effected at all by it. I cannot say if it works if you eat it, but I have doubts about its ability to kill intestinal parasites if it did nothing to my ants.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Great easy mixing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes super easily and for “earth” pretty mild flavor. I don’t have to gag it down. I’m very happy but I still supplement with bentonite here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralin Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: We searched through Amazon for a food grade D.E. and found this one. We're happy with the quality, value and overall would order again. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: I really don't know how we took care of certain ...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how we took care of certain issues without diatomaceous earth. My husband and I take it daily and it has improved the health of our hair and nails plus cleaned out our digestive systems. I suggest researching online first before you use it and see all the benefits plus how to handle it safely. It's not poisonous but you don't want to inhale into the lungs or get in your eyes because it will irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good for flea control
customer_reviews.text: Used it for flea control. It's extremely drying to skin so use small amounts, but damn does it work!! Noticed fleas dying within an hour or so and bi-weekly treatments had them completely gone in about 2 weeks. Now I just have to figure out what to do with all the left over earth!
customer_reviews.author: Aureliya

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Did great with what I ordered it for which is insect control in and around my living area. Did really good with that. No worries about poisons etc and my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: JustaDudeTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Great heath product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff been on it for about 2 months now ! Beautiful hair and nails
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: Non chemical way to kills ants and anyother bugs
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed to keep the ants out of my house and any other insects. Once I covered the areas they were coming in through they stopped, of course they came from another spot but after some time they just stopped. I still have some for next summer when they ALWAYS come back. Grr! Best way to get rid of bugs without the chemical sprays.
customer_reviews.author: cpinks

customer_reviews.title: You can kill certain types of bugs with this
customer_reviews.text: I used this to kill bugs in my garden so I have no idea about the flavor I thought it would kill squash bugs but it didn’t seem to maybe I needed to use more,will try again this summer but it was killing some bugs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous Earth
customer_reviews.text: Food grade Diatomaceous Earth can be mixed in a shake or juice drink and is beneficial to use as food. Also it is the best and least expensive pest control system I have ever encountered.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Beevers

customer_reviews.title: This came in a white plastic non resealable bag with no real lable just a bar code.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've purchesed this item I only wish it was in the resealable bag as stated in the comments; I also wish it came in a bag that was clearly labled. It feels funny consuming a white powder from a white plastic bag with no label.
customer_reviews.author: EVERETT JONES

customer_reviews.title: This killed the earwigs in my house. As for ...
customer_reviews.text: This killed the earwigs in my house. As for eating, it reminds me of tofu. It has a sort of chalky taste on its own, but if I mix it in with soup or yogurt I can't taste it.
customer_reviews.author: Darky

customer_reviews.title: It's the best remedy I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: It does help with the amount of fleas I find on my dog if I put some in him after he's had a bath. I also put it on muy carpet and vacuum it up. It's messy and leaves dust everywhere but it helps. The fleas don't go away completely though. It's the best remedy I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible but! I purchased it because I red somewhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible but ! I purchased it because I red somewhere that it would help to get rid of fleas .. it didn't work and it almost broke my vacuum ... I had to clean out my vacuum several times for it to stop acting up ! If you have a flea problem do not try this
customer_reviews.author: Vania

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Silica product
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my protein shakes. It is a high quality silica powder, which is great for hair, nails, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Schar R

customer_reviews.title: Larger Sizes are NOT in Resealable Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, but it was not in convenient 1 lb bags like it suggests, nor was the bag it was in resealable. I had to pour it into my own baggies and it was very much a hassle. Other than that, this is fantastic. I've been using it to kill all types of crawling bugs, prevent fleas with my ferrets, facial scrub, etc.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Tastes a little funny
customer_reviews.text: Tastes a little different but from what I remember Each DE bag has a little different taste. I was hoping for the normal dirt taste that is more common for DE
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works to kill bedbugs and other little pests
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with icky bed bugs for a little while due to a neighbor bringing them over. This powder knocked them out. The only thing is that you need to be ready to dust your house as this stuff does get in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Elysium

customer_reviews.title: Not quite too sure
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of black stone grit balls in it I feel like I'm just consuming sand compared to the other companies I've been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs on contact.
customer_reviews.text: This will even destroy the dreaded bedbugs. No need of 1000's of dollars of heat treatment. Just have to be thorough with the application. The process can be time consuming depending on your home size. After a week or two, just vacuum the powder. I used in indoors and on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: doesn't kill roaches.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Texas, and one thing there are a lot of here are roaches. We got this, hoping that it would help with our problem, but it hasn't made much of an impact. It may work great for health benefits, but the wife and I haven't tried it for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Armatis

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Was told it works on fleas it didnt was messy. Wouldnt ever buy again
customer_reviews.author: melissa hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: GOT RID of Fleas in the HOUSE~~ ! Thank you!~
customer_reviews.text: Got RID of fleas in the house, naturally. I try to eat a teaspoon or tablespoon daily as a de-wormer. Yes, sounds gross but Google "human intestinal worm parasites." I sprinkle this in my cats' kibble too for worm control. Do a little research. Sprinkle on the carpet for flea control. Sprinkle in litter box.
customer_reviews.author: FLowWOOLF NATURALS

customer_reviews.title: It arrived punctured and powder spilled inside the amazon box ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived punctured and powder spilled inside the amazon box it came in. Since I wanted food grade, and its punctured, I can not use it, hence the one star review.
customer_reviews.author: GSP

customer_reviews.title: Great for destroy ants hill.
customer_reviews.text: This very effective on ant hill. The ants is gone after a few day.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Flea be gone
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it has worked for the fleas, but they seem to be less in visibility. Am going to get more to add more to yard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quantity for price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and super versatile! Very happy with this purchase, I was surprised by the amount I received for the price! Would purchase again but this will likely last me a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla F.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Quality...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second bag. I'm rebalancing my yard. It's in the city and it's been depleted. This works well to keep the unhealthy bugs away. I'm on my third summer and I'm amazed how well things have turned around. It's a combination of many products, but I keep this one in my garden shed.
customer_reviews.author: Big D Jorie

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Although this was not as effective as the non-food grade in getting rid of the fleas, I felt a lot better using it around my cats.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: ordered it for a flea problem i had for weeks and it killed them all within a few days. excellent. bag is huge, you get a lot. be careful when opening because I accidentally sliced the side of the bag with my boxcutter knife when i ran it down the middle. nothing duct tape can't fix though.
customer_reviews.author: Dorianna Lang

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have drank this for great health, and I use it on all my dogs to get rid of fleas! The is FOOD GRADE only DE. Make sure you do not order the pool chemical DE please! This DE works great!! Low price, no smell, many uses!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Prince Charron

customer_reviews.title: dont know it it actually does what it says other ...
customer_reviews.text: dont know it it actually does what it says other than it did kill fleas on my cats at the cost of staying in there fur for weeks and making your hands feel gross after petting them. i drank it with water for a few weeks and didnt notice anything ,but im not saying it wasnt doing something that i wasnt able to detect.
customer_reviews.author: t.b.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Does this stuff work on my yard. Did just what I wanted - rescued a bad spot in an otherwise good lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Pompanojack

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the dog - I've seen a big decline ...
customer_reviews.text: We got it for flea control. Works great on the dog - I've seen a big decline in fleas since using it which I didn't see when using the chemicals. We used it in the house too. Haven't seen as many fleas, but it makes a BIG mess. Dust gets one everything and it doesn't vacuum up well. I'd say it's worth it to kill the fleas but my wife may think differently.
customer_reviews.author: D. Howie

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous earth is like the greatest invention on the planet for your pets
customer_reviews.text: Diatomaceous earth is like the greatest invention on the planet for your pets, I dust my Cats every other day and they are just dead to the world, the night that I dust them, it takes away every itch on the planet, every Flea everything, they're just so happy when they get Dusted ❗🙌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and I would highly recommend some kind of funnel when pouring this product.
customer_reviews.author: Late reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work fine, but the plastic zipper bag they put it in won't stay shut.
customer_reviews.author: calidawglvr

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a large clear bag with a sticker on the front. There's quite a lot of diatomaceous earth inside. I bought this to deal with an infestation of tiny black ants and it seems to have wiped them out. I also used it in my greenhouse to encircle my plants and keep ground insects off of them. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this for the garden, chickens, cats, dogs and sometimes myself. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: flea killer
customer_reviews.text: using it to hopefully kill fleas in carpet and also on my dogs and cats, I tried it in one room and it took a couple of application but after 3 weeks I feel like I broke the flea cycle! Super happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: MoreSawsPlease

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working.
customer_reviews.text: I put it around the outside of the house where ant trails were prevalent and then a couple places inside where ants were spotted (such as leading to the dog's food dish) early in the season and haven't had the usual infestation throughout the house. It must be working.
customer_reviews.author: Dann Fox

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I just started gardening and wanted to get rid of pests using organic stuff (otherwise what’s the point). DE definitely works! No bugs on the plants that have DE dusted on them! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harkamal Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great for pest control
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for pest control in our sand box and it is working great! Keeps all of the ants and sand wasps away and doesn't bother my kiddo's skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Good for killing bugs inside and out!
customer_reviews.text: Kills bugs inside and outside of your body. Using this to kill pinworms (and probably other parasites), as well as creepy crawlies that I don't want in my house. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to go around our chicken coop because ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go around our chicken coop because we saw some ants. We also put down some sand. I don't know which was the most effective, but the ants haven't shown up nearly as much. The package came on time without damage. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Grits

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Good price. We use on our vessel to control any unwanted pests. D Earth is a safe alternative to dangerous chemicals. We have birds and a dog and wouldn't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging and food grade
customer_reviews.text: My cholesterol finally went down 40 points. It is doing what meds couldn't do. Will purchase again. Good packaging and food grade.
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was what I expected and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Lacivita

customer_reviews.title: I love my DE
customer_reviews.text: I love my DE! This literally saves my life, by shutting off one of my genetic mutations ... without it, life isn't so fun for me. This is quality, mixing in easily with my smoothies, juice, even plain old water, without too much of an aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Chalky feel but it isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.text: Just mix a heaping tablespoon with water and drink twice a day. Chalky feel but it isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not just the best non-toxic flea/ant/roach control, the best period.  Love this stuff & it DOES work!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to get 5 lbs of food grade DE for $13. Bag is very sturdy and re-seals, no complaints or problems with the product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I had a bad flea infestation during the summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a bad flea infestation during the summer. It worked great. So happy. Even used on my dog and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: krepola

customer_reviews.title: food grade diatomaceous earth
customer_reviews.text: very good product.does what it says it will do.but don't expect overnight results takes awhile for it to start working but you will soon see results would buy again
customer_reviews.author: royparkerson

customer_reviews.title: Love the benefits of this product.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a little flimsy but I love the product. I have given it to every family member including our dog. Whenever she acts like she is not feeling well, I make sure she get this product and she acts so much happier. Its odd but I love it. For us, my youngest son had many warts that would not go away. This product was better than duck tape, ACV, homeopathic remedies, etc. My middle son always had slow growing, thin nails but with this product, he can now keep up with his younger brother that has ever growing nails. This does not even begin to account for what was not seen that it helped with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
